description:
There are basically 3 ways to add pictures and video clips.

  • Directly upload from your device.

  • From previous uploads (if any).

  • From your Facebook gallery.



Just click on the add button [ ＋ ] or simply select the button to 'Add Photos' and you will get the following screen:

  From previous uploads (if any).  
  From your Facebook gallery.

title: How do I add video clips to my video?
